title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.720 - Distribution systems: leak repair
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.720 - Distribution systems: leak repair

State Regulations

Mechanical leak repair clamps installed after January 22, 2019 may not be used as a permanent repair method for plastic
pipe. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.720

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
